english: Fee Standards for Biological Products, Centers for Disease Control, Ministry of Health and Welfare
title: 衛生福利部疾病管制署生物製劑收費標準
history: Formulated and announced in 5 articles on April 29, 2009, by the Department of Health, the Executive Yuan, under Shu-Shou-Chi Order No. 0980000318

Amended the title (original title: Fee Standards for Biological Products, Centers for Disease Control, Department of Health, the Executive Yuan) and Articles 2 and 5 and the Attachment to Article 4 and announced by the Ministry of Health and Welfare on December 31, 2013 under Bu-Shou-Chi Order No. 1020103933; with the exception of the Attachment to Articles 4, which shall enter into force on January 1, 2014, the Fee Standards shall enter into force beginning the date of promulgation.
Amended 5 articles and announced by the Ministry of Health and Welfare on November 2, 2016, under Bu-Shou-Chi No. 1050101155
Amended Article 5 and the Attachment to Article 4 and announced by the Ministry of Health and Welfare on May 10, 2019, under Wei-Shou-Chi Order No. 1080100440; shall enter into force on July 1, 2019.

articles.content: This set of Standards is formulated in accordance with the regulations of Article 10 of the Charge And Fees Act.
This set of Standards applies to the biological products manufactured and commissioned for production by the Centers for Disease Control, Ministry of Health and Welfare.
The biological products mentioned in this set of Standards are Antivenins.
Items and fees charged for the manufactured and supplied biological products are as shown in the Attachment.

This set of Standards shall enter into force on January 1, 2017.
The Attachment to Article 4 of these standards, amended on May 10, 2019, shall enter into force on July 1, 2019.
